Q <- list()

    all.equal(25.39, mean(study1_ages$age_years, na.rm = T) %>% round(2)))
} else { FALSE } %>% all()

} else { FALSE } %>% all()

    c(

      filter(study2_by_sex, sex == "male") %>% pull(n) == 6012,
      filter(study2_by_sex, sex == "intersex") %>% pull(n) == 3
    )
} else { FALSE } %>% all()
